alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Manatee and north central Sarasota Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lakewood Ranch to near Lake Sarasota. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Lake Sarasota, The Meadows, Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota Springs, Kensington Park, North Sarasota, South Gate Ridge, Gator Creek Estate, Desoto Lakes, Fruitville and Bee Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
